title: Universal Adapter Adapter
description: Universal Adapter which processes direct requests to perform custom HTTP requests and process the results with user-provided JavaScript

SANDBOX_URL.description: URL of the FaaS sandbox where the custom HTTP requests and user-provided code are executed

SANDBOX_PRIVATE_AUTH_KEY.description: Private key used to authenticate with FaaS sandbox

MAX_HEXSTRING_RESPONSE_LENGTH.description: Max size of the hex string allowed from the sandbox
